content: crochet your own adorable tiger with stripes cute paws and long tail in a sweet sitting position this amigurumi tiger is the perfect gift for tiger lovers and those born in the year of the tiger note that the free crochet pattern can be found *** here 1 *** and has been divided into two blog posts since there are so many process photos **part 1** covers how to crochet the head ears and body and can be found *** here 2 *** **part 2** covers how to crochet the legs arms tail and assembly and can be found *** here 3 *** i used approximately 48 g/111 yds of peach coboo 14 g/32 yds of taupe coboo 9 g/21 yds of white coboo 1 g/2 yds of pink coboo for the nose and 2 g/5 yds of fluffy white yarn go for faux in baked alaska for the fur detailing on the sides of the head we started a fun tradition of designing the zodiac amigurumi of that year since january 2011 so far we have lamb dragon rooster monkey pony snake rat dog chinese new year doll pig ox and now tiger we have one left to go rabbit they are all available as free patterns on my blog or as pdf s here on ravelry condensed documents that contain all the step-by-step pictures enjoy these zodiac amigurumi designs 1 https //www allaboutami com/chinese-new-year-tiger-pattern-part-1/ 2 https //www allaboutami com/chinese-new-year-tiger-pattern-part-1/ 3 https //www allaboutami com/chinese-new-year-tiger-pattern-part-2/
